name: Taklink
author: taklink

sections.description:
What is Takl.ink?

تک لینک or Takl.ink is a tools to make a bio link with multiple links. You can use TakL.ink as Instagram bio link or other social networks like Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, …

After register on takl.ink you have a bio link like takl.ink/username. You can add multiple links, text, video, sound and etc.

What dose this plugin do for me?

This plugin allow you to use onee page of your site domin as your takl.ink bio link Url.

takl.ink/username => yoursite.com/username

Takl.ink WordPress plugin Features

  • Use your custom domain instead of takl.ink domain for your bio link
  • Select which page show bio link
  • Easy to use

Some Takl.ink Features

  • Modules: Text, link, Phone, Email, FAQ, Video, Music, Map, …
  • Upload custom avatar
  • Bio info
  • Question and answer module
  • Change bio link appereance with Free & pro themes
  • Social register & login
  • Social icons module
  • Simple statistics
  • Advanced statistics
  • Customize Modules style
  • Make custom theme
  • Product module (Coming soon)

Translations

  • English
  • Persian (Farsi)
sections.installation:
To install and using Takl.ink please follow these steps:

  1. Create an account on Takl.ink
  2. log in to your takl.ink account and navigate to Panel page page.
  3. Click on account link
  4. Copy Api Token from opened section.
  5. Install this wordpress plugin and active it.
  6. After plugin installed, Navigate to Dashboard > Settings > TakL.ink
  7. Paste Api token at Api Token field
  8. Select page that you want to use as your bio page URL
  9. Save changes and visit your selected page and Enjoy it!
sections.faq:
How it works?

Takl.ink will allow you to connect your bio link in takl.ink to your WordPress site and use all takl.ink features on your own site domain
